wisheshayen kandawurak thuladi garbhanibhawayata pathwena kanthawan ho garbhani wi kandawuruwalata eemata siduwana kanthawanta surakshitha mawpadawiyak laba dima sandaha awashya siyaluma waidya pahasukam salasime wishesha wada piliwelak me wana witath apa saukhya amathyanshaya ha ekwa karagena yanawa.

pura wasara 6 k mululle eki amathyadhuraye wagakim mana lesa itu kala janaka bandara amathyawaraya siya dhura kalaya thula karyakshama ha paladayi palath sabha paddhathiyak ha palath palana aayathana paddhathiyak pawathwagena yama sandaha siya athdakim paripurna deshapalana nayakathwaya laba dena ladi. 2010 wasare sita idam ha idam sanwardhana amathyadhuraye wagakima gath amathyawaraya eki wishayabhara amathyawaraya lesin wasara 5ka kalayak katayuthu kala athara palath sabha ha pradeshiya sanwardhana amathyawaraya lesin 2015 aprel masaye sita 2015 agosthu masaya dakwa katayuthu karana ladi.

oya praja sathkara thiyanawa neda, issara mata hitha ganna ba athe thiyana shatheyi, thamange dahasak wada thiyeddi ee wadakata thiyana kalayayi anun wenuwen wiyadam karanna meyalata thiyana kasilla mokak da kiyala.
uthuru palath sabhawe nawa amathyawarun ada (23) dinaye diwurum di thibe.
udama thiyena peththa eka kiyala ganan gaththama deka thuna hathara paha kiyala wampaththata ee kiyanne wamawruthawa pethi ganinakota grahayo inne kohomada kiyala anduraganna puluwan .
